name: IPIX Technologies
description:
IPIX Technologies is one of the best Web development company in India, WordPress development company in India & eCommerce development company India.
IPIX, the group entity of Morison Menon, is making its headway in serving global corporate giants for the past decade. IPIX Technologies is one of the top web development, ecommerce development & wordpress development company in India & USA. We believe in thinking about the next, and this filters down from the big picture to the minute details. IPIX has a broad range of offerings in IT Consulting, Software development, Web development, portals, E-commerce development, WordPress development, Mobile apps development, Digital marketing and Enterprise solutions with 10+ years of expertise. We integrate best in class flagship products like Internal Audit Management, Learning Management System, HRMS, Time based Project Management System, ERP to create customized solutions to enable technology-driven sustainable growth of client's business. IPIX has got the privilege to serve reputed global clients like DM Helath care, Aster, Noor Bank, Zayed Military, ADCB, Sharjah Sports Council, Dubai Department of Tourism and Commerce Marketing, MI, Fortune Groups, GEMS Education etc. Rooted in Calicut, IPIX has never limited its growth; we are now serving more than 3000+ plus clients all over the world. Ever curious, IPIX is always eager to find out the next best and biggest thing, so, our clients get the impetus they want.
